extendedInfo.description: MyScreenplays is a non-linear film screenwriter software for Android mobile devices.Something like Celtx or Final Draft but for Android.MyScreenplays uses an unique non-linear approach to mobile screenwriting. Whith this you can access to any element of your script and do whatever you want with it.Its like a non-linear video editor but for screenwriting.Main features are:Automatic format.Auto indent, auto format, auto upper case, automatic parenthetical, transitions...Automatic cover. Just insert your data in settings screen.Autocomplete for characters, locations and parenthetical directions.Smart automatic alternate on new dialogs. Changes the character who talks for it's own.Non linear edition. You can create edit and/or move your elements (dialogs, actions, sequences) like an non linear video editor. Just click on the arrows and slide.With a clipboard you can move or duplicate any element between different scripts or sequences. Use clipboard for store a screenplay with shots or any other coommon pieces.Export fully formatted hollywood standard screenplays.Exports in: -HTML (ready for print in industry standard)-PDF (requires internet connection)-Doc (to open your script and edit it in any word processor including google docs, microsoft word, openoffice, libreoffice...)-LaTeX (using standard LaTeX packages)-Celtx: you can export your scripts for using on a Celtx desktop/mobile aplication-Final Draft: Export for final draft screenwriter software.Imports:Screenplays from other devices shared on the cloud using google docs powerFinal Draft: load a .fdx file on your google docs and use it in myScreenplaysCeltx: load a .celtx file on your google docs account and import it in myScreenplaysYou can also use this app to convert a Celtx file into a Final Draft one and vice-versa!Headers in Italian, Portuguese, German, FrenchCreate new screenplays from scratch or using outlines as template.Cloud integrated with Google docs technology. You can export or import scripts using your google docs account.Share with other people and work together.Continue your work between many devices. (ie. your phone and your tablet).Voice input.(requires voice search from google).Outline:Treatment support using google docs technology. Just fill a form and apply it to your script or create an entire new one based on your outline.Treatment editor. Use it for your info, notes or whatever.Wysiwyg preview Edit directly on preview. Just click the element you want to change.Stats:Set target Page count Characters About Permissions:Permissions for accesing your Google docs account are required if you want to use cloud features like import/export, share and treatment.Also needs internet connection for PDF export.This is a Free version with ads. Pro version without ads it's also avaliable.At this point both versions are the same except for the ads.This can change in future versions.Please report any bugs you found!

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: It\'s a simple script writing app and seems to be able to read and write from google drive well after I updated Celtx. Unfortunately, due its unyielding structure, it has formatting quirks and the import/export of Celtx files misses and adds formatting elements, such as INT/EXT and DAY/NIGHT on a montage title.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great little app
reviews.comment: Great for your phone. Interesting non linear process. Great export options.  Free version is very easy to use. Perfect for getting a scene done while on the go. I will be sharing this with my android using, film making friends!
reviews.author: Steve Walshe

reviews.title: Works Well.
reviews.comment: I love that when I have the chance to work I can. It is a great app for those wanting to write screenplays.  Pros: Easy editing, fast script loads.  Cons: No title page option, no option to edit contact info (using an LG Enlighten)   If the cons are fixed this will be a 5-star app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No Undo or Confirm delete
reviews.comment: Import works great and its nice to not be linear...however when you`re in the sequence editor it is really easy to hit delete esp when selecting from the drop down... which deletes the whole sequence text and all! Please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Horrible, HORRIBLE app if you\'re trying to import celtx files. Either shuts down or claims lack of internet connection when you try to import.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Okay...
reviews.comment: Would give 5 stars, but I don\'t think that the import instructions are clear. Good app otherwise.
reviews.author: Maryam Zahra

reviews.title: YASMIN
reviews.comment: I like it it\'s pretty cool an im writing my drama series on it. Thank goodness for this app!! ^.^
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Glenn
reviews.comment: Great tool,similar to scriptbuddy.Only took 5 minutes to work it out.Great tool for a person\'s 1st screenplay as you can be on a train,add it immediately without having to wait to get home.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A good start
reviews.comment: Its a handy app once you get used to it but could really use a easy to edit the title page and a way to add transitions easily
reviews.author: Eoin Moriarty

reviews.title: It Works!
reviews.comment: Played around with it, celtx-ed it and uploaded to my dropbox. Checked my computer and...it works! Not perfect (in which I believe over time it will only get better) but so far it\'s good enough for me. It\'s not like I\'m gonna write a whole script on my tiny phone anyway. Good job guys!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app 1 small problem
reviews.comment: Good app easy to use writing on the go great but to get that 5th star the importing needs to be fixed because it never works importing the title please fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I got this app a while ago and I love it. Combined with the SwiftKey keyboard, it makes writing on the fly super easy.  Exporting to Dropbox as a doc worked perfectly. I\'d buy the full version but the ads aren\'t very annoying so I don\'t see much point. Give the full version some extra features an you\'ll have my support.
reviews.author: Josh May

reviews.title: A Few Features Missing but Cool
reviews.comment: I like this app a lot. I like it\'s integration with google drive and dropbox and the ability to import and export final drat formats. It makes my life much easier since it fills a gap in no other decent final draft app.  That being said there are some quirks: I don\'t like how your only time options are day and night. Evening and Morning would be useful. I don\'t like the way parentheticals work either. Screws up some dialogue. The outline feature is odd and doesn\'t really work they way its described. Shots get kind of weird in the formatting as well as (cont\'d) on characters but that might be the way that the files are being imported.  I know that sounds like a lot but this app gets a lot of things right.  So keep up the good work and keep the updates coming.
reviews.author: Brendan Rowe

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Really easy to use, very intuitive. Exactly the kind of screewriting program I\'ve been looking for. Export functionality is just great: seamless transfer to Celtx on the comp. Very useful for writing on the fly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost excellent
reviews.comment: As a tool for editing screenplays on the go, I have few complaints. In fact, I\'m surprised how well it works. Exporting from Final Draft is easy and (with the exception of some lost scene headers) seamless. Well, this app also doesn\'t seem to want to play with mid-dialog parentheticals, opting to break each one into a new dialog box upon importation as well.  I only briefly tested the export back to my desktop, but it looked great as well, no losses or errors as far as I could tell on a skim-through, and it even lets you export to PDF!  As far as writing on the app itself, very smooth sailing, but adding a new paragraph to the middle of an existing scene can be a bit hard if you\'re writing long scenes (and in most cases, you shouldn\'t).  Other than that, I haven\'t even bothered looking at the competition! For a free app, that\'s pretty amazing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great concept, if only...
reviews.comment: If only the software allowed for non-latin characters (text) , then I would be able to use it. But I write scripts in the Greek language and the software has problems handing that - all the text comes out encoded (= garbage ). Hopefully this will be fixed soon...
reviews.author: Leonidas Kossis

reviews.title: Love it...butttt...
reviews.comment: I love this app.  It\'s nice to take my scripts on the go.  My one problem is that I can import final draft docs easily, but my friend uses Celtx, so I had to switch to that for a project, and I would\'ve love to convert it to final draft but my celtx scripts import into the app blank!  Would love a fix unless someone has advice?
reviews.author: Kelsey Gillespie
